description.value:
Trigger A creature enters the room.

Effect The trap sprays cleaning chemicals at the triggering creature dealing [[/r (1d8+4)[acid]]] damage. The creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:20|traits:acid,damaging-effect] save, and the trap then rolls initiative.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Dazzled]{Dazzled} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Blinded]{Blind} for 1 round.

details.description: Solvents and detergents spray from the ceiling and run down the walls where they combine in dangerous ways.
details.disable: @Check[type:engineering-lore|dc:20|name:Disable Control Panel|traits:mechanical,complex]{Engineering Lore} (trained) or @Check[type:thievery|dc:20|name:Disable Control Panel|traits:mechanical,complex] (trained) to deactivate the control panel, or @Check[type:athletics|dc:21|name:Plug the Spouts|traits:mechanical,complex] or @Check[type:acrobatics|dc:21|name:Plug the Spouts|traits:mechanical,complex] to plug the spouts that release the chemicals; three successes are required to disable the trap.
details.reset: The trap deactivates after 1 minute and resets in 1 hour.
details.routine: (3 actions) The trap fills the room with a cloud of caustic vapor and deals [[/r (2d6+2)[acid]]] damage to all creatures in the area (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:20|basic:true|name:Cleaning Agent|traits:acid]).

source.value: Pathfinder Society Intro #2: United in Purpose
